Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory36.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'The end of the passage glows red from the alarm.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Unable to see the other side of the wall, HNB1 readies his weapon and nods to HBG3. Whatever comes in will be destroyed by their coordinated attack.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiSHanshuoNew.prefab'}
{3: "A stone flies through the dust, bouncing off of HBG3's chest and rolling to HNB1's feet behind him."}
{3: 'The dust disperses, revealing a human standing in place.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Scanning<<<<Assessing danger level<<<<', 4: '2'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "Don't attack. It's a human.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "More precisely, it's a child.", 4: '1'}

{3: "The child in front grabs a small stone beside her, holding onto it like a weapon. She clenches her lips and her eyes brim red. Eyeing the two Tai'E units cautiously, she seems to be looking for an opening to escape."}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'Greetings. We mean no harm. Did you come in from outside?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Go away!', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The girl throws another stone, but it bounces off HNB1\'s face with a clear "ding."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Hey, kid! Relax! Do you know how expensive I am?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'HBG3', 3: "Sensing increased heart rate and breathing. Emotional analysis indicates level one fear. Possibility to attempt escape—97.25%. We won't attack you, and you can't run away from us. Please, cease from resisting.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'HBG3 puts the weapon down and quietly steps back.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "...Alright alright, guess there's no other way.", 5: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Here kid, I'll drop my weapon too.", 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Where are your parents? Why are you here alone? Oh, you hurt your knee... Are you okay? Are you separated from your parents? What's going on outside?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "HNB1, can you please turn off your human emotion module? It's interfering with my analysis.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "If you don't bandage your wound, it'll get infected. Look... Hey! Wait!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Right as the Tai'E units are talking to each other, the girl uses this opportunity to slip between them like an alerted deer.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Hey—! Now you're kicking me! I'm expensive!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'HBG3 stretches out its huge steel hand and picks the girl up. The girl screams in the air and kicks her legs in vain.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: "You're safe now, human child. We have rescued you.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory83.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Let's see. There's sand in your wound. Looks serious...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: 'There is an 82% chance of scarring.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'Her hostility against you has increased.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Thanks for the explanation. But I'm pretty sure she's trying to punch you in the face, not me.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I don't care about... Ow!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Don't move. We need to sterilize the wound, or it will get infected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: 'Through my analysis of past human habits and behaviors, the non-therapeutic act of blowing on a painful wound can achieve psychological comfort.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I mean... it's not like you can blow air!", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: 'I have a ventilation system installed on my back. Want to give it a try?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: 'HNB1, there is a 35% chance that the human will be dragged inside your ventilation system if you were to use it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "I'm just messing with her. I'm not one to hold grudges against some little girl—Alright, done! Here's a pretty bow tied up and... you're good to go!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "You two are weird... But you don't have the virus... Thank you, I guess.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'By virus, do you mean the effects of the "Punishing Virus"? May I ask, what is that?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Daddy said... The Punishing Virus will hurt people and make robots sick.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Sick robots will... attack humans.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'There are too many sick robots, so people have to fight them.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'We were supposed to drive to a safe place. Daddy said a big boat would take us away, but our car was stopped. So Daddy told me to run first and he would pick me up.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Daddy told me to... stay away from mechanoids... and keep running to stay alive.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'So I ran the other way... I ran for a long long time...', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The girls eyes brim with tears and her nose sniffles as she shakes her head.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'I ran for a long time until I ended up here.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: 'You just mentioned a safe place. Do you know where that place is?', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I don't know...", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'How does the virus spread? Is it airborne or...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I... I don't know.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "If they were planning on evacuating by boat and the main city area is at war, a general range can be calculated by combining her path and the location of the city's port.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: 'Our top priority now is to send the human child to the safe point.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "You're not reporting back for duty?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "We are Tai'E. Our top priority is to ensure human safety.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "But we don't know anything about the virus. If it causes machines to go haywire...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "But hey, we're still functioning normally.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'An explosion faintly rumbles in the distance. All three look in the direction of the noise.'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: 'Combined with the existing information, there must be malfunctioning machines in the city. The safest option would be to avoid them at all costs.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'HBG3 activates his control screen, projecting the topographic map of Kowloong City out of his chest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'Do you see the map?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "Wait... I didn't say I'd go with you!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I'm going back to the city! Daddy must be worried about me. He said he would pick me up!", 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Don't be silly. You hear that? That's the sound of war. If you just came from the city, you should know what happened better than us. You are a human child... Even if we go with you, we can't guarantee your safety.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'I... I can protect myself!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I know what happened... That's why I have to go back!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Also... Why would I trust you in the first place!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Quit joking around. Regardless, I...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "Okay. Then we shall go with you. It'll definitely be faster with us than just you alone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "Article 1 of the KCC Pulao Crew regulations, Tai'E shall not harm humans, or by inaction allow humans to come to harm.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "These are our instructions hardwired into our programming. I can't disobey, neither can you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Of course, I know that! But if she really wants us to take her to the battlefield...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "You and I don't know what's going on in the outside world either.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Alright, you win.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Okay then, kiddo. Let's get you to your place.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'So, do you know how to read a map?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'I can try.', 4: '3'}
